import axios from"axios";// const baseUrl = "https://stark-ridge-32063.herokuapp.com/api/persons";
var baseUrl="http://localhost:3001/api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});return request;};var remove=function remove(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request;};var update=function update(person){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(person.id),person);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,remove:remove,update:update};
